  • Constructor Details

    • WineBox

      public WineBox(Wine w, boolean cart, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> f)
      Instantiates a wine box to buy that wine
      Parameters:
      w - The wine
      cart - True if it is destined for a cart, false otherwise
      f - The handler action of the button
